text: Saa ɛda no, wɔbɛkrukyire asɛm a ɛka sɛ: KRONKRON MA Awurade14.20 KRONKRON MA Awurade: Yei yɛ nsɛm a wɔatwa agu sikakɔkɔɔ apaawa so de abɔ ɔsɔfopanin no abotire anim (2 Mose 28.36-38) a ɛde kae no sɛ wɔayɛ no kronkron ama Awurade adwumayɛ. wɔ adɔmma a ɛsensɛn apɔnkɔ kɔn mu ho, na nkukuo a wɔde noa aduane wɔ Awurade fie no bɛyɛ sɛ nkuruwa kronkron a ɛsisi afɔrebukyia anim.
